translations: n.导航；航行，航海；航运，水上运输；浏览，访问；领航术，航海术；内河水道（尤指运河）

phrs.translation: 海上航行；水运；航海学；海洋船舶驾驶
海上导航；航海导航；船舶导航；航海术

sentences.sentence: Carousels are essentially slideshow navigations, in which the content rotates vertically or horizontally (hence the name "carousel").
sentences.translation: 旋转木马本质上是幻灯片导航，其中的内容垂直或水平旋转（因此得名“旋转木马”）。

sentences.sentence: Moreover, Italian sailors were deserting and emigrating, and captains, no longer recruited from the ranks of nobles, were weak on navigations.
sentences.translation: 此外，意大利的水手都在逃离和向外移民，船长也不再是从贵族阶层中招募，在航海方面也很弱。

sentences.sentence: Study on the representation of Macau in Elizabethan England (1589-1600), namely in Richard Hakluyt's Navigations.
sentences.translation: 研究澳门在英国伊丽莎白女王时代（1589-1600年）的形象，即《理查德·哈克路特的航海》中的代表性。
